title: Android Studio 1.2.2 Build AI-141.1980579 - AppzDam
description:
For more info visit : appzdam.net

Android Studio - an integrated development environment (IDE) for the platform Android, announced May 16, 2013 at the conference Google I / O. IDE is freely available since version 0.1, published in May 2013 and then moved to the stage of beta testing, starting with version 0.8, which was released in June 2014. The first stable version 1.0 was released in December 2014, at the same time to stop supporting the plug Android Development Tools (ADT) for Eclipse. IDE is based on software from the company IntelliJ IDEA JetBrains.

Features :

Android Studio is positioned as a means to improve the speed and efficiency of design and touted replacement Eclipse. The program allows you to test the application on devices with different screen sizes and even different versions of the API, your program will work properly on different versions of Android, which in these times is very important.
Of the other "chips" it is worth noting the built-in integration with Github, with support for multiple APK different functions within the same project, and monitor optimization module RAM.
